::: {.justify}

Holds a Bachelor's degree in Law from the Federal University of Rio de Janeiro (UFRJ), a Master's degree in Law from the State University of Rio de Janeiro (UERJ), and is a co-founder of the Institute for Migration, Gender and Race (I-MiGRa). She is an associate researcher on the research project Climate Change, Occupational Health and Decent Work: Vulnerabilities and Responses of Workers in Brazilian Agriculture, at the Federal Fluminense University (UFF).

:::
